document.discussion_title: The world in photos: Aug 15- Aug 21[1]| World photos
document.topic_text: The world in photos: Aug 15- Aug 21 Updated: 2016-08-22 09:45 (chinadaily.com.cn) Here, we present some of the most striking images from major stories around the world in the past week. Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi gestures as he addresses the nation from the historic Red Fort during Independence Day celebrations in Delhi, India, August 15, 2016. [Photo/VCG]
